name: .AXM
summary: Learn about .AXM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an AXM file in Autodesk FormIt Pro (Windows) and Autodesk FormIt (web). To open an AXM file in FormIt Pro, select File → Open Sketch → Locally... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your AXM file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .axm file in Autodesk FormIt 2022
images.caption: AXM file open in Autodesk FormIt 2022
